All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BFS
Searches to check if there is a valid path to a winning state for the current player
BFSNode
This node is used to implement the breadth first search algorithm Each node has a parent node, a state represented as player coordinates, and x, y coordinates.
BFSStrategy
Strategy algorithim for the game Quoridor
BFSStrategyTest
 
BFSTest
 
Board
The board creates the platform where the player and the fences can interact with each other
BoardTest
 
CFP
Close fence strategy is a strategy method to place the fence close in front of the opponents direction to make it difficult for the opponent to reach its goal
CFPTest
generates and places a horz fence
Fence
Fence is used to block players from reaching their goal and can be placed in fence reserved spaces
FenceTest
 
Node
 
Player
Player is the pawns used in the Quoridor board game to move and interact around the board and reach the opposite end of the board to win the game
PlayerTest
 
RFP
Random placement of fence strategy places all the fences randomly across the board or it's player moves
RFPTest
 
SimulationExperiment
Runs a simulation and conducts 20 trials and calculates the win count of all the combinations among the strategies such as RSA, BFS and CFS played against each other
TestTutorial
